title: #74 - Hotline Edition: Dating a Guy Five Months and He Wants to Host Our Families for the Holidays. Help!
description:
You have questions and Maria has answers! 

It’s another edition of the Ask a Matchmaker Hotline, where you can directly ask Matchmaker Maria your questions. (If you want to call on a future episode, be sure to follow her on Instagram to know when the hotline will be open next)

This week, we talk about...

  • It’s the holidays! How to handle dating in your hometown when you go home.
  • I think I’m a bad texter. How do I fix that?
  • I’m discouraged with dating. What should I do?
  • How do I date when I have a demanding job?
  • How to handle the holidays with your partner's families.
  • How do you meet people outside of your own friend circle?
  • What if I’m dating a guy who has a voice I don’t like?

Want to join an upcoming Agape Intensive? 2022 dates just announced! http://agapeintensive.com

Follow Maria on Instagram to find out when the Matchmaker Hotline will be open to talk! http://instagram.com/matchmakermaria 

Follow Agape Match on Instagram at http://instagram.com/agapematch

Follow the podcast on Instagram at http://instagram.com/askamatchmaker
author: maria@agapematch.com (Maria Avgitidis)
